com.paydiant.android.core.util

Class RestTemplateFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.util.RestTemplateFactory

  • public class RestTemplateFactory
extends Object
    The rest template Factory initializes the rest template and always returns a single instance of the rest template. The fact that the resttemplate is a single instance is critical to ensure that the rest template is aware of sessions
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.
